Title: Relates to manufactured homes certificate of title and the conveyance and encumbrance of manufactured homes as real property
Summary: Enacts the "New York land-home property act"; relates to manufactured homes certificate of title and the conveyance and encumbrance of manufactured homes as real property.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the real property law, in relation to manufactured home certificates of title, and the conveyance and encumbrance of manufactured homes as real property
